description:
Make BrowserMediaPlayerManager a WebContentsObserver instead of a RenderViewHostObserver so that it can filter IPCs.

This is part of the work in removing RenderViewHostObserver.

BUG=306569
R=qinmin@chromium.org

Committed: https://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=230789

messages.text: oh, thanks but I wasn't ready to send this for reviews yet. I'm still thinking about this some more.
